Name: Puzzle Light: Slide
About the game: Puzzle Light: Slide is a Logic Game. The goal in each level is to take all the pieces to the indicated place and turn on the lights. 50 hand-crafted levels; A fun puzzle game (even for those who have no knowledge of electronic circuits);
